author: craigmcc
msg: Improve the ability of the struts-html.tld tags to operate in containers
that do not call doAfterBody() when a tag has no body, and/or do not allow
access to the bodyContent property in the doEndTag() method.

msg: Reset the "text" instance variable in doStartTag() so that no body content
